title: Maureen Birnbaum, Barbarian Swordsperson
description: As Mike Resnick remarks in his introduction, the author has created "an entirely new type of humor - Preppy Science Fiction." Here are Maureen Birnbaum's first eight adventures, For Sure!: Maureen Birnbaum, Barbarian Swordsperson; Maureen Birnbaum at the Earth's Core; Maureen Birnbaum on the Art of War; Maureen Birnbaum After Dark; Maureen Birnbaum Goes Shopynge; Maureen Birnbaum and the Saint Graal; Maureen Birnbaum at the Looming Awfulness; Maureen Birnbaum's Lunar Adventure.
author: George Alec Effinger
